# toolDefinitions

**Instance Property**

A list of tools made available to the model.

## Declaration

```swift
var toolDefinitions: [Transcript.ToolDefinition]
```

## Inspecting instructions

- **segments**: The content of the instructions, in natural language.

items.description: The content of the instructions, in natural language.
items.name: segments
